description.value:
This crooked staff is made from twisting acacia wood and has a sphere of rough sandstone embedded in the top, to channel the magic of the desert. When wielding this staff in deserts, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Survival checks to Subsist, Track, and Cover Tracks.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from the staff's list.

  • Cantrip @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Know Direction]{Know Direction}
  • 1st @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Create Water]{Create Water}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Pass Without Trace]{Pass Without Trace}
  • 2nd @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Endure Elements]{Endure Elements}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Enhance Victuals]{Enhance Victuals}
  • 3rd @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Remove Disease]{Remove Disease}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Wall of Wind]{Wall of Wind}
  • 4th @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Air Walk]{Air Walk}
  • 5th @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Elemental Form]{Elemental Form}

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells
